original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged down in mid day trade on Tuesday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was down 0.23 percent or 23.25 points to 10,288, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.50 percent or 14.90 points to 2,989.06
The market generated a turnover of 1.4 billion rupees at 1200 hours.
Top losers during mid day trade were Melstacorp, Commerical Bank and Hemas Holdings. (Colombo/July11/2023)
